(I just made up the name of Flesh Ripper for a story, Alloran, please post 
damage for Sharpedge and Jetstorm from my prior post, labled the same as this 
one)


Oblitertron/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Demon 
Wulf/Sixshot/Ares/Serpentor/Unitron/Chaos/Minion:




Oblitertron saw the bombs approaching, and fired off three optic blasts, two 
going wide and heading for the Mafia base, the other heading directly for the 
other bomb.

Oblitertron disassembled, the individual robots scattering as to not be easy 
targets in a large group.

---

Dark Claw targeted again, firing off two more missiles at the Mafia base.  He 
was starting to lose ammunition.

---

Demon Wulf opened his mouth, firing off a fireball from his mouth at Doom Ice.

---

Flesh Ripper let the missile knock him to his skid plate.  He merely let out 
a hoarse laugh, firing off five rapid optic blasts off at Gigas' chest.

---

Ares was hit with the four missiles from Serge, sending him rolling off to 
the side with dents and holes in his armor.

---

Sixshot in the air saw Serge open fire and take out Ares.  Activating his 
targeting computer, he fired down two missiles at Serge.  Ares wasn't as 
strong as Sixshot, but if things got bad in the Alliance, the STAG would need 
all the help he could get.

---

Unitron turned the cannon to target Rizopas, firing off a single energy blast 
in his tank mode at Rizopas.

---

Serpentor arrived on scene, seeing a few autoguns fire on him.  Ignoring the 
shells that were almost piercing his armor, he raised his plasma launcher, 
firing off a blast at Doom Ice.  (NOTE: Plasma launcher is same as bazooka, 
only plasma energy instead of large explosive shell)

---

Minion cursed as weapons fire knocked him back.  Getting up, he fired off 10 
rapid optic blasts at Doom Ice.

---

Chaos transformed to his missile trailer mode, firing off two missiles at the 
Mafia base.
